description:
Play Android games on PC or try instantly from our cloud.


1. Get real-time game alerts on your phone with BlueStacks Mobile Notifications so you never miss events, rewards, or limited-time opportunities. Stay updated on the go and control everything with a simple toggle in BlueStacks Settings.
- Easily choose which apps can send you notifications
- Link multiple devices and turn notifications on or off anytime
- Receive timely reminders for limited-time events and rewards
